result.name: glaven-and-stiffkey-estuarine-and-coastal-investigation-microbiological-analysis
result.notes:
As part of contract C7260, 55 samples of freshwater and seawater were 
collected at sites in the Stiffkey and Glaven catchments and in Blakeney 
Harbour in the winter of 2016/2017. Each sample was tested for concentrations 
of the bacterium E. coli using membrane filtration techniques. The data were 
reported by the laboratory as colony forming units/100ml and the results 
recorded in the form of Excel spreadsheets.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Glaven and Stiffkey Estuarine and Coastal Investigation - Microbiological analysis

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: CSV, ESRI Shapefile. The data can also be accessed via the WFS and WMS protocols.
